x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | aspval2.a | |- A = ( AlgSpan ` W ) |

| 4 |  | aspval2.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 5 |  | #P_elin | |- ( x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) <-> ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ x e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) ) |

| 7 |  | #P_anass | |- ( ( ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ x e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) /\ S C_ x ) <-> ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ ( x e. ( LSubSp ` W ) /\ S C_ x ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_bitri | |- ( ( x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) /\ S C_ x ) <-> ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ ( x e. ( LSubSp ` W ) /\ S C_ x ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 10 | 2, 9 | #P_issubassa2 | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ x e. ( SubRing ` W ) ) -> ( x e. ( LSubSp ` W ) <-> ran C C_ x ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_anbi1d | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ x e. ( SubRing ` W ) ) -> ( ( x e. ( LSubSp ` W ) /\ S C_ x ) <-> ( ran C C_ x /\ S C_ x ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_unss | |- ( ( ran C C_ x /\ S C_ x ) <-> ( ran C u. S ) C_ x ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ x e. ( SubRing ` W ) ) -> ( ( x e. ( LSubSp ` W ) /\ S C_ x ) <-> ( ran C u. S ) C_ x ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_pm5.32da | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> ( ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ ( x e. ( LSubSp ` W ) /\ S C_ x ) ) <-> ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ ( ran C u. S ) C_ x ) ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_syl5bb | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> ( ( x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) /\ S C_ x ) <-> ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ ( ran C u. S ) C_ x ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_abbidv | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> { x | ( x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) /\ S C_ x ) } = { x | ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ ( ran C u. S ) C_ x ) } ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> { x | ( x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) /\ S C_ x ) } = { x | ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ ( ran C u. S ) C_ x ) } ) |
| 18 |  | #P_df-rab | |- { x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) | S C_ x } = { x | ( x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) /\ S C_ x ) } |
| 19 |  | #P_df-rab | |- { x e. ( SubRing ` W ) | ( ran C u. S ) C_ x } = { x | ( x e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ ( ran C u. S ) C_ x ) } |
| 20 | 17, 18, 19 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> { x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) | S C_ x } = { x e. ( SubRing ` W ) | ( ran C u. S ) C_ x } ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_inteqd | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> |^| { x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) | S C_ x } = |^| { x e. ( SubRing ` W ) | ( ran C u. S ) C_ x } ) |
| 22 | 1, 4, 9 | #P_aspval | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> ( A ` S ) = |^| { x e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i ( LSubSp ` W ) ) | S C_ x } ) |
| 23 |  | #P_assaring | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> W e. Ring ) |
| 24 | 4 | #P_subrgmre | |- ( W e. Ring -> ( SubRing ` W ) e. ( Moore ` V ) ) |

| 28 |  | #P_assalmod | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> W e. LMod ) |

| 32 | 30, 31 | #P_syl | |- ( W e. AssAlg -> ran C C_ V ) |
| 33 | 32 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> ran C C_ V ) |
| 34 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> S C_ V ) |
| 35 | 33, 34 | #P_unssd | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> ( ran C u. S ) C_ V ) |
| 36 | 3 | #P_mrcval | |- ( ( ( SubRing ` W ) e. ( Moore ` V ) /\ ( ran C u. S ) C_ V ) -> ( R ` ( ran C u. S ) ) = |^| { x e. ( SubRing ` W ) | ( ran C u. S ) C_ x } ) |
| 37 | 26, 35, 36 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> ( R ` ( ran C u. S ) ) = |^| { x e. ( SubRing ` W ) | ( ran C u. S ) C_ x } ) |
| 38 | 21, 22, 37 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> ( A ` S ) = ( R ` ( ran C u. S ) ) ) |
